REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0053 reute h f BC-BARNETT-BANKS-<BBF>-P 03-09 0050

TEXT.TITLE: BARNETT BANKS <BBF> PROPOSES NAME CHANGE
TEXT.BODY: Barnett Banks of Florida Inc proposed changing its name to Barnett Banks Inc, the company said. The company said shareholders will vote on the proposal, made in its 1987 proxy statement, at the annual meeting on April 22. Reuter
